name: Liam_Waurie
content:
Liam Waurie was a male Human who served as an officer in the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.
In 1 ABY, an accident took place in the Imperial Research and Prison Facility on the planet Dathomir. The Blackwing virus that was studied there escaped containment and decimated hundreds of beings, turning them into starving undead creatures. In response, the Galactic Empire promptly established a Quarantine Zone to contain the infection. Lieutenant Waurie was deployed on Dathomir where he was in charge of the contingent of stormtroopers that guarded the entrance to the Quarantine Zone.
Liam Waurie appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Liam Waurie was added to the game with the "Game Update 14", a.k.a. the "Death Troopers" update, released on October 12, 2009.
